result.name: commercial-opportunities
result.notes:
HSE enters into contracts with external organisations for the provision of goods and services.   
Contract opportunities with HSE worth more than £10,000, closed tender documentation, contract awards and contract documents are available on Contract Finder.  
The dataset included the location, value of details of the contract.

organization.name: health-and-safety-executive
organization.title: Health and Safety Executive
organization.description:
The Health and Safety Executive (HSE) is the national independent watchdog for work-related health, safety and illness. It acts in the public interest to reduce work-related death and serious injury across Great Britain’s workplaces.

HSE is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Work & Pensions

http://www.hse.gov.uk/

result.title: Commercial opportunities
